name: restty
description: Browser terminal rendering library powered by WASM, WebGPU/WebGL2, and TypeScript text shaping.

scripts.build:assets: bun run build:text-shaper && bun run build:restty-input && bun run build:restty-wasm
scripts.check:themes: bun run build:themes && git diff --exit-code -- src/theme/builtin-themes.ts
scripts.format: prettier --write README.md package.json .github/workflows/*.yml scripts/*.ts playground/lib/*.ts src/app/types.ts src/app/atlas-builder.ts src/theme/catalog.ts src/theme/index.ts tests/builtin-themes.test.ts
scripts.format:check: prettier --check README.md package.json .github/workflows/*.yml scripts/*.ts playground/lib/*.ts src/app/types.ts src/app/atlas-builder.ts src/theme/catalog.ts src/theme/index.ts tests/builtin-themes.test.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build:themes && bun run clean:dist && bun run build:lib && bun run build:types
scripts.test: bun test tests/webgpu-glyph.test.ts tests/box-drawing.test.ts tests/pty-utf8.test.ts tests/input-kitty.test.ts tests/input-keymap.test.ts tests/output-filter.test.ts tests/kitty-graphics-probe.test.ts tests/kitty-graphics-placement.test.ts tests/kitty-bridge.test.ts tests/builtin-themes.test.ts
